name: Monkey Knife Fights - NGJ16
description:
The Other Unreal Team presents:

MONKEY KNIFE FIGHT!!!! Make your enemy LEAK with blood or bow in defeat as the crowd CHEERS OVER YOU CORPSE! It's YOU or HIM in MOONKEY KNIIIFE FIGHT!!! FEEEEL THE DRUMS AND PANIC RUSHING THOUGH YOUR SLENDER MONKEY BODY AS YOU SLICE YOUR WAY TO VICTORY! !

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dodge and stab your way to victory in this fun multiplayer party game! :)
Plays best with controllers.

The 3 CG Artists - Casper Knudsen, Micheal Jarberg & Pia Hansen
